site_name: Land At Southmere Village, Binsey Walk, Tavy Bridge, Southmere Drive And Mere Road Adjacent To Harrow Manorway And Yarnton Way London
description: Application for a non-material amendment to provide an increase of one unit, a reconfiguration to the wheelchair units and minor amendments to the overall unit mix as well as some minor changes to the internal layouts and external appearance..to the parent permission (16/01251/FULM).The parent permission being for the demolition of existing buildings/hard standing, residential development of 525 units and 3691 sqm (GIA) of commercial floorspace with flexible uses across classes A1-A3 (retail, financial/professional services, caf√©/restaurants), B1a (office), D1 (Non-residential institutions) and D2 (Assembly and leisure) and associated works including, informal and formal open space, internal road network; landscaping;car and cycle parking;waste storage.
